sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtrdnmadrzip ( rdmn_code , sn , ctprvn_nm , signgu_nm , rdmn , bdnbr_mnnm , bdnbr_slno , buld_nm , detail_buld_nm , zip , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #rdmnCode# , #sn# , #ctprvnNm# , #signguNm# , #rdmn# , #bdnbrMnnm# , #bdnbrSlno# , #buldNm# , #detailBuldNm# , #zip# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtrdnmadrzip SET rdmn_code = #rdmnCode# , sn = #sn# , ctprvn_nm = #ctprvnNm# , signgu_nm = #signguNm# , rdmn = #rdmn# , bdnbr_mnnm = #bdnbrMnnm# , bdnbr_slno = #bdnbrSlno# , buld_nm = #buldNm# , detail_buld_nm = #detailBuldNm# , zip = #zip# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND sn = #sn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtrdnmadrzip WHERE 1 = 1 AND sn = #sn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rdmn_code , sn , ctprvn_nm , signgu_nm , rdmn , bdnbr_mnnm , bdnbr_slno , buld_nm , detail_buld_nm , zip , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM COMTRDNMADRZIP WHERE sn = #sn#

SELECT A.RDMN_CODE , A.SN , A.CTPRVN_NM , A.SIGNGU_NM , A.RDMN , A.BDNBR_MNNM , A.BDNBR_SLNO , A.BULD_NM , A.DETAIL_BULD_NM , A.ZIP , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT RDMN_CODE , SN , CTPRVN_NM , SIGNGU_NM , RDMN , BDNBR_MNNM , BDNBR_SLNO , BULD_NM , DETAIL_BULD_NM , ZIP , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTRDNMADRZIP WHERE 1=1
RDMN_CODE = #searchKeyword#
SN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY SN DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTRDNMADRZIP WHERE 1=1
RDMN_CODE = #searchKeyword#
SN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
